name: Trustfall (KRÉ)
description:
This game was created to the 9th Brackey's game Jam. I always like challenges, but to be honest, this theme wasn't mine. I spent half of the week shifting from one idea to another. With this I do not feel the success on the theme aspect. But I created something new, shiny, and relaxing to play with. 

A kind of a never ending story.
